backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report containing an empty feature list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main SPA component rendering all sections with scroll‑based metadata updates.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, simulated submit delay, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing SEO approach, principles, and tools used.
frontend/src/components/sections/CaseStu: Renders a case studies section showing SEO project challenges, actions, and results using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays a contact section with location, response details, a contact form, and direct email info.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Defines the homepage hero with intro text, CTA buttons that scroll to sections, and a list of specialties.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows a grid of SEO services with icons, descriptions, and deliverables inside styled cards.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying SEO specialist info, attribution, and current year.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with scroll‑aware navigation and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and utility classes for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider wrapping the root component.
frontend/src/seo/seoConfig.ts: Defines SEO metadata types and provides default SEO settings, section-specific metadata, base site URL, and JSON-LD structured data configuration.
frontend/src/seo/SeoHeadManager.tsx: React component that updates document head tags (title, meta, Open Graph, Twitter, canonical URL, and JSON-LD) based on provided SEO metadata and section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site purpose, SEO goals, constraints, existing features, and architectural notes for the portfolio website.
